featured.text: For 11 of the 27 energy drinks, the ABT did detect the presence of alcohol if the test was given within one minute after the drink was taken.
They asked test subjects to drink a full can or bottle of an energy drink and then gave each subject an ABT one minute and 15 minutes after the drink was finished.
The scientists then investigated the possibility that these small levels of alcohol could be detected by an ABT.
What is the most important factor that affects the ABT test result for energy drink consumers? (A)
To discover the relation between energy drinks and ABT test results.

definition.example: We talked about the project during the meeting.
